setting.value: {"application": [{"version": "1.0.0", "iconhash": "NA", "lastupdated": "2015-02-20", "id": "ftp-app-osmc", "iconurl": "NA", "maintained-by": "OSMC", "shortdesc": "This allows you to connect to your OSMC device via FTP", "longdesc": "This installs a vsftpd server on your OSMC device allowing you to transfer files via FTP. The default username and password are both osmc.", "name": "FTP Server"}, {"version": "1.0.0", "iconhash": "NA", "lastupdated": "2015-02-20", "id": "smb-app-osmc", "iconurl": "NA", "maintained-by": "OSMC", "shortdesc": "This allows you to connect to your OSMC device via SMB", "longdesc": "This installs a Samba server on your OSMC device allowing you to log in to transfer files via Samba (particularly useful for Windows users). The default username and password are both osmc.", "name": "Samba (SMB) Server"}, {"version": "1.1.3", "iconhash": "NA", "lastupdated": "2015-03-14", "id": "ssh-app-osmc", "iconurl": "NA", "maintained-by": "OSMC", "shortdesc": "This allows you to connect to your OSMC device via SSH", "longdesc": "This installs an OpenSSH server on your OSMC device allowing you to log in to your device remotely as well as transfer files via SCP. The default username and password are both osmc.", "name": "SSH Server"}, {"version": "3.9.0-9", "iconhash": "NA", "lastupdated": "2015-03-14", "id": "armv7-tvheadend-app-osmc", "iconurl": "NA", "maintained-by": "OSMC", "shortdesc": "This allows you to connect your OSMC device as a TV tuner.", "longdesc": "This installs a TVHeadend server on your device which brings live TV and PVR capabilities. A web interface is available on port 9981 and the default username and password are both osmc.", "name": "TVHeadend Server"}]}
